body_content.explanation: a way of referring to a person who was born in the late 1990s or early 2000s:
examples: Millennials and Zoomers aren’t parents and children respectively but rather siblings, one older and one younger, both forged by the internet.
Generation Z consists of those people (also known as zoomers) who were born between 1997 and 2012.
This colour is sometimes called Zoomer green to reference the generation who wears it.

body_content.explanation: a person using Zoom (= a brand name for computer software that allows a group of two or more people to see and talk to each other over the internet using their computers, tablets, or smartphones):
examples: Get to know all the options that are available and you’ll be the most clued-up Zoomer on your next video chat.
